description: A boy who lives among the wolves of Wolvendom in Mondstadt. Razor is a physical DPS who excels at fast claymore attacks and Electro bursts.
info: Razor is a 4★ physical DPS who excels at fast claymore attacks and Electro bursts. Focus on Physical DMG, CRIT, and ATK%.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Steel Fang
skills.desc: Performs up to 4 consecutive claymore strikes.
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 4 consecutive claymore strikes.
Charged Attack
Drains stamina over time to perform continuous spinning attacks against all nearby opponents. At the end of the sequence, performs a more powerful slash.
Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Claw and Thunder
skills.desc: Razor swipes with the power of Electro, dealing Electro DMG. Press: Swipes quickly. Hold: Swipes twice, generating more Electro Sigils and dealing AoE Electro DMG.
skills.details_html:
Claw and Thunder
Press: Swipes with Electro, dealing Electro DMG and generating an Electro Sigil. Hold: Swipes twice, dealing AoE Electro DMG and generating up to 3 Electro Sigils. Electro Sigils increase Razor's Energy Recharge and can be consumed to restore Energy.

skills.name: Lightning Fang
skills.desc: Razor summons the Wolf Within, dealing AoE Electro DMG to all nearby enemies. For the duration, Razor's attacks are infused with Electro, his ATK SPD and Electro RES are increased, and he is immune to Electro-Charged status.
skills.details_html:
Lightning Fang
Summons the Wolf Within, dealing AoE Electro DMG. For the duration, Razor's attacks are infused with Electro, his ATK SPD and Electro RES are increased, and he is immune to Electro-Charged status. The Wolf Within attacks alongside Razor, dealing Electro DMG.

passive_talents.name: Awakening
passive_talents.desc: Decreases Claw and Thunder's CD by 18%. Using Lightning Fang resets the CD of Claw and Thunder.

passive_talents.name: Hunger
passive_talents.desc: When Razor's Energy is below 50%, increases Energy Recharge by 30%.

passive_talents.name: Wolvensprint
passive_talents.desc: Decreases sprinting Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.

constellations.name: Wolf's Instinct
constellations.desc: Picking up an Elemental Orb or Particle increases Razor's DMG by 10% for 8s.

constellations.name: Suppression
constellations.desc: Increases CRIT Rate against enemies with less than 30% HP by 10%.

constellations.name: Soul Companion
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Claw and Thunder by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Bite
constellations.desc: When casting Claw and Thunder (Press), enemies hit have their DEF decreased by 15% for 7s.

constellations.name: Sharpened Claws
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Lightning Fang by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Lupus Fulguris
constellations.desc: Every 10s, Razor's sword charges up, causing the next Normal Attack to release lightning that deals 100% of Razor's ATK as Electro DMG. When under the effect of Lightning Fang, this will summon a lightning strike that deals 20% of Razor's ATK as Electro DMG to all nearby enemies.
